chunks.en: The girl you used to like got married, how do you let go of this relationship?
'Used to like' is not a relationship. So what exactly is your relationship? If there's no relationship, just don't contact her. Time will solve everything.

chunks.en: shift + crtl + enter automatically sent my reply saying, honestly, male best friends are the most unstable factor in a stable relationship. I wish you happiness and leave me with the last bit of dignity! After that, although I kept her on WeChat, I blocked her Moments. She didn't tell me she was getting married. During the Spring Festival in 2024, I suddenly remembered and looked at her Moments. The wedding photos were beautiful. Later, I saw her pregnancy diary and her baby's first birthday diary on her video account. My heart fluttered a bit, but there wasn't really any special feeling. From 2011 -> 2021, we knew each other for ten years. During that time, I had three girlfriends, and after breaking up, I would go to her harbor to confide. She would listen quietly and comfort me from time to time. She also dated a boyfriend in 2019. She accepted the guy's confession one night, but the next night she broke up because the guy got carried away and kissed her face (hugged her and kissed her face) and scared her. We agreed that if we were both still unmarried before the age of 30, we would just get together and live together, hahaha. Saying so much doesn't mean anything else. It's not to make OP understand my mood, nor to make OP feel like we have any resonance. People, adults, adult men, all have pressures from the economy and family. Look forward. Other people's lives are good, what does it have to do with you? Friends only need blessings. She deserves better, and you deserve better too.
Her husband was filled like a cream puff on their wedding night, and you're still longing for her here?
Just imagine the scene of her being fiercely ridden by another man and you'll be relieved.
She's married, now I like her even more.
I used to like the Mercedes G63, but it was bought. How do I let go of this relationship?
@MuSeCanYang This island nation netizen, please calm down.
What you can't let go of, someone else has already put it in.
Who doesn't have a 'white moonlight' (unattainable love)? There will always be regrets in life. Treat the people around you well, and just hide that little regret in the deepest corner of your heart.
She's become someone else's shape.
Behind every woman you want to fuck, there's a man who's already fucked her to the point of vomiting.
She's already married and you still can't let go? Do you want to raise her children?

Meet new girls. Don't think of yourself as so sentimental. You'll forget her when you meet someone prettier and more to your aesthetic satisfaction. You can't let go simply because you haven't been exposed to anything better.
What does this have to do with you?
Reminds me of a saying, you only like a certain type of person.
Wait for her to get divorced and then you take over.
What were you doing earlier? Now I suggest you shut up.
Develop into a lover.
I strongly opposed when Lin Chi-ling married Akira, but did it help? You still have to let go when it's time to let go. ğŸ˜ª
Imagine the scene of her being fucked senseless by her husband, and you'll probably be relieved.
